On Eggs

talk for "Naive Yearly"
2023
talk at National Film School of Denmark
Copengagen, Denmark
I shared a curation of my Are.na Channel “Eggs in Art & Design” to explore the cultural history of the egg. Special thanks to Kristoffer Tjalve for orchestrating “Naive Yearly.”
